strings.NEWT_PRAY_NORMAL: <style=cWorldEvent>{0}{1}: So much thanks {2}! Here's something for you <style=cIsHealth>{3}</style></style>
strings.NEWT_PRAY_ELITE: <style=cWorldEvent>{0}{1}: Thanks buddy! {2}, you might want to use this <style=cIsHealth>{3}</style></style>
strings.NEWT_PRAY_PECULIAR: <style=cWorldEvent>{0}{1}: Goddess bless you {2}, something special for you <style=cIsHealth>{3}</style></style>
strings.NEWT_WELCOME_WORD_4: <style=cWorldEvent><size=24px>{0}: What can I do for you.</size></style>
strings.NEWT_ANGRY_WELCOME_WORD_3: <style=cWorldEvent><size=24px>{0}{1}: How dare you come here again?</size></style>
strings.NEWT_ATTACKED_WORD_1: <style=cWorldEvent>{0}{1}: Do You Want to Build a Snowman. Come on let’s go and play!</style>
strings.NEWT_ATTACKED_WORD_2: <style=cWorldEvent>{0}: Hit me harder. Did you not eat? Falure.</style>
strings.NEWT_ATTACKED_WORD_3: <style=cWorldEvent>{0}: I don't have any change for you, sir.</style>
strings.NEWT_ATTACKED_WORD_4: <style=cWorldEvent>{0}: Do you have a tissue? I have to go to the bathroom.</style>
strings.NEWT_ATTACKED_WORD_5: <style=cWorldEvent>{0}: Do you want to hear a joke? You're a joke.</style>
strings.NEWT_ATTACKED_WORD_6: <style=cWorldEvent>{0}: Many people die, never see you die. </style>
strings.NEWT_ATTACKED_WORD_7: <style=cWorldEvent>{0}: You will pay for what you did.</style>
strings.NEWT_ATTACKED_WORD_8: <style=cWorldEvent>{0}: You are too sensitivity! It's already the day break outside. You can phone me while I am at home. </style>
strings.NEWT_ATTACKED_WORD_9: <style=cWorldEvent>{0}: Press Alt + F4 to get the latest steam game sale, the lowest 250% off.</style>
strings.NEWT_ATTACKED_WORD_10: <style=cWorldEvent>{0}: You know what? You're playing with fire.</style>
